TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract implements class System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract, class System.AddIn.Contract.IContract

remarks.format: ## Remarks To get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract>, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract.GetEnumeratorContract%2A> method of an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryContract>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.RemoteArgumentDictionaryEntry GetEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the key and the value of the current entry.
Docs.returns: A that contains the key and the value of the current entry.

remarks.format:
## Remarks After an enumerator is created or after the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract.Reset%2A> method is called, the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract.MoveNext%2A> method must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before calling the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract.GetEntry%2A> method; otherwise, the return value of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract.GetEntry%2A> is undefined.
<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract.GetEntry%2A> also throws an exception if the last call to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection.
<xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract.GetEntry%2A> does not move the position of the enumerator, and consecutive calls to <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentDictionaryEnumeratorContract.GetEntry%2A> return the same object until either <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentEnumeratorContract.Reset%2A> is called.

Docs.exception: The is positioned before the first entry of the or after the last entry.
